title: Authors and Citation
text: Cesar Barboza. Maintainer, author. Ger Inberg. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Barboza C, Inberg G (2024). ReportGenerator: Automatic Report Generator Darwin EU Studies. R package version 1.19.2, https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/ReportGenerator/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ReportGenerator: Automatic Report Generator of Darwin EU Studies},   author = {Cesar Barboza and Ger Inberg},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.19.2},   url = {https://darwin-eu-dev.github.io/ReportGenerator/}, }

title: Automatic Report Generator of Darwin EU Studies
text: ReportGenerator creates automatic study reports DARWIN EU® research. Shiny app interactive menu user can select figures tables Complete Catalogue Standard Data Analyses.

title: Automatic Report Generator of Darwin EU Studies
text: can install development version ReportGenerator like : reportGenerator() takes input zip csv files results IncidencePrevalence. launch Shiny app just type console: Alternatively, can access online version . Load results IncidencePrevalence TreatmentPatterns packages. ReportGenerator accepts data latest versions, offers limited legacy support. ReportGenerator() accepts files ZIP format multiple data partners, following directory structure, CSV files visualise individual results. way, user can load results TreatmentPatterns ZIP format, including metadata file identify results data partner. test package, user can generate mock data ReportGenerator::generateMockData(), create “Results” folder data zip format.
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("darwin-eu-dev/ReportGenerator") ReportGenerator::reportGenerator() # IncidencePrevalence ZIP Folders    C:   |--results_CHUBX.zip   |       |--incidence_attrition.csv   |       |--prevalence_attrition.csv   |       |--incidence_estimates.csv   |       |--prevalence_estimates.csv   |   |--results_CPRD.zip   |--results_IMASIS.zip   |--results_IPCI.zip  # CSV files    C:   |   |--incidence_attrition.csv   |--prevalence_attrition.csv   |--incidence_estimates.csv   |--prevalence_estimates.csv # Directory TreatmentPatterns    C:   |--results_CPRD.zip   |       |--countsAge.csv   |       |--countsSex.csv   |       |--metadata.csv   |       |--summaryStatsTherapyDuraion.csv   |       |--treatmentPathways.csv   |   |--results_IMASIS.zip   |--results_IPCI.zip   |--results_SIDIAP.zip ReportGenerator::generateMockData()

title: ReportGenerator 1.19.2
text: Update new versions analytical packages. Fixed bug related other_result.

title: ReportGenerator 1.19.0
text: Improved integration summarisedResult() format IncidencePrevalence, CohortCharacteristics CohortSurvival.

title: ReportGenerator 1.18.0
text: omopgenerics integrations IncidencePrevalence data extraction.

title: ReportGenerator 1.17.3
text: Update renv.lock

title: ReportGenerator 1.17.1
text: Fixed tests.

title: ReportGenerator 1.17.0
text: Binds results using result_id.

title: ReportGenerator 1.16.0
text: Bug fix test mock utils.

title: ReportGenerator 1.15.0
text: Update use CohortCharacteristics Integration omopgenerics Shiny app generation

title: ReportGenerator 1.14.0
text: User can drop zip folder results multiple analytic packages. PatientProfiles CohortSurvival added main menu.

title: ReportGenerator 1.13.0
text: Updated tested IncidencePrevalence 0.6.0

title: ReportGenerator 1.12.0
text: Improved tests.

title: ReportGenerator 1.11.0
text: CRAN release test. Added tests examples.

title: ReportGenerator 1.10.0
text: Preview persist even changing different tables figures.

title: ReportGenerator 1.9.0
text: Users can select version IncidencePrevalence data ReportGenerator accepts. Yaml file items configuration. Github website. Improvements function variablesConfigYaml() add new versions results yaml file.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.2
text: New download button.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.1
text: Updated last CRAN version IncidencePrevalence.

title: ReportGenerator 1.8.0
text: Preview items can locked added Word report. Fixed bug prevented loading one database. Corrections plot filters.

title: ReportGenerator 1.7.1
text: Fixes filters facets figures.

title: ReportGenerator 1.7.0
text: Fixed bug “unknown file” generating Word report. Added incidence prevalence figures sex age. User can select data table 1 according analysis_id

title: ReportGenerator 1.5.1
text: Automatic text corrections Fixed error loading files temp dir

title: ReportGenerator 1.5.0
text: Plotting now uses functions IncidencePrevalence package. Improved code efficiency using reactiveValues gather data. Fixes mock data generator; now generates mock populations different sizes.

title: ReportGenerator 1.4.0
text: file input now accepts multiple zip folders, .e. data several databases. Drag drop menu back. Bug related type graph prevented generation report solved.

title: ReportGenerator 1.3.0
text: Tables now use package Huxtable. Table 1 now available preview print report. Data cleaned now every time new zip uploaded file input. Fixes reset.

title: ReportGenerator 1.2.0
text: Figures incidence now drop menu select facet, either database outcome.

title: ReportGenerator 1.1.0
text: Check new logo! Figure 1 now drop menu tu select either Option Option B (Facet Outcome, Facet Database).

title: ReportGenerator 1.0.1
text: Improvements generateMockData()

title: ReportGenerator 1.0.0
text: Working version use Darwin sprint. Main functionality package can accessed reportGenerator(), launches Shiny app. Tables Figures show results incidence IncidencePrevalence package.
